response: *Lucius O'Brien, 13th Baron Inchiquin (1800–1872), Tory MP for Clare (1826–1830; 1847–1852) and Lord Lieutenant of Clare (1843–1872)Harrow, 1800–1911, p. 62
*Lucius O'Brien, 13th Baron Inchiquin (1800–1872), Irish politician and nobleman

Born the eldest son of Lucius O'Brien, 13th Baron Inchiquin and Mary Fitzgerald. He took the title in March 1872, upon the death of his father, and was appointed a Knight of the Order of St. Patrick on 5 August 1892.
